member.name: M:PongVB.frmMain.tmrClock_Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Technically just an event handler for the timer, however I'm using it as the game loop.
member.param: used to distinguish between senders, for example, if I had this handle both tmrClock and another timer, I'd use sender to see which event is being handled
